name: The Demon's Pact
description:
The Demon's Pact

In The Demon's Pact, players take on the role of a mortal seeking revenge who makes a pact with a demonic entity. Journey through dangerous dungeons, battle monstrous creatures, and collect resources to construct a portal for the demon's pact.

This game is made in 8 days for the gamejam submission juice jam 2.



Credits

Coding: felaix & BlackFox

Pixel Art: felaix & HOKFMK

UI/UX: felaix

Sound & Music: Maskheroe

Also a special thanks to everyone who helped to improve the project through feedback!
